definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: The creature fell onto its side, had a fit and died.
sentences.chinese: 那只羊侧身倒了下去，抽搐了一下就死了。

sentences.english: It leans, and harkens after it.
sentences.chinese: 它也就侧身向前去倾听。

sentences.english: Feng Xiao low head and bed, sideways facing windows.
sentences.chinese: 枫晓低着头又上了床，侧身面对着窗户躺着。

sentences.english: She sidled on to a bar stool and her skimpy black skirt slid up her thigh.
sentences.chinese: 她侧身坐上吧椅，她那黑色超短裙滑上她的大腿。

sentences.english: The old man edged along on the bench towards the window.
sentences.chinese: 那老人在长凳上侧身慢慢向窗口移动。

sentences.english: Then they walked sideways through a narrow passage.
sentences.chinese: 然后他们侧身穿过一条狭窄的通道。

sentences.english: This yoga pose involves a sideways-facing forward bend.
sentences.chinese: 这涉及到一个瑜伽姿势侧身面向前屈。

sentences.english: Melanie lay on her side, her face white.
sentences.chinese: 媚兰侧身躺在床上，脸色像白纸一样。

sentences.english: Some people came closer only extremely ugly dog, then sideways away.
sentences.chinese: 有人走近一看是只奇丑无比的小狗，便侧身走开了。

sentences.english: She leaned on her lover's arm.
sentences.chinese: 她侧身倚在情人的手臂上。

sentences.english: She sidled up to me so that I could kiss her left breast.
sentences.chinese: 她侧身迎向我，我能够吻到她的左乳了。

sentences.english: Now there was leaning on Jesus' bosom one of his disciples, whom Jesus loved.
sentences.chinese: 有一个门徒，是耶稣所爱的，侧身挨近耶稣的怀里。

definition: to get out of the way
to lean over/to bend over/to stoop/to bow
to lean forward/to lean out (of a window, door etc)
the back (human anatomy)/the back part of sth
to sway one's hips/to twist one's waist
